comments.body: huh? I'm confused.Mind you, I think you need to add CANADA to that list of banned countries. I do find it odd that Cuba is in that list. They have crypto bans? Or securities restrictions?

comments.author: whitefish
comments.body: I understand it might be confusing. The list includes countries with crypto bans or securities restrictions. Cuba, for instance, has certain restrictions in place.
